AirRider.name: AirRider
AirRider.description:
Kevlar Body Armor that ignores the Whiplash critical injury from car crashes as long as the armor's CO2 tank is full*.

*Must be manually added after acquiring the armor.

Bunker Gear.name: Bunker Gear
Bunker Gear.description: Fireproof flak armor with a built in gas mask and 30 minutes of oxygen in a tank that refills itself after an hour. -4 to REF, DEX, and MOVE.

Dirk Combat Jacket.name: Dirk Combat Jacket
Dirk Combat Jacket.description: Leisurewear-styled Light Armorjack and the ability to conceal two standard magazines without a check.

Executive Armor.name: Executive Armor
Executive Armor.description: Light Armorjack that looks like businesswear. Restores 1SP every day SP isn't lost on the armor.

Laser Light Street Jacket.name: Laser Light Street Jacket
Laser Light Street Jacket.description: Urban Flash-styled Light Armorjack that counts as a Light Tattoo while worn.

Lotos Netsuit.name: Lotos Netsuit
Lotos Netsuit.description:
A netsuit allowing an extra cyberdeck hardware slot that's installed directly into the suit which is uninstalled if the suit is removed. Comes standard with an Excellent Quality Cyberdeck*. -2 to REF, DEX, and MOVE.

*Must be manually added after acquiring the armor

MechaMan Motorcycle Helmet.name: MechaMan Motorcycle Helmet
MechaMan Motorcycle Helmet.description:
A Kevlar motorcycle helmet with integrated smart glasses that come with Chyron and Low Light / IR / UV pre-installed*.

*Smart Glasses and associated cyberware must be manually added and installed after acquring the armor.

Mimic Clothing (Asia Pop).name: Mimic Clothing (Asia Pop)
Mimic Clothing (Asia Pop).description: Light Armorjack made from a Mimic Clothing Kit and "Asia Pop" clothing.

Montage Variable Clothing Line.name: Montage Variable Clothing Line
Montage Variable Clothing Line.description: Light Armorjack that can swap between "Generic Chic" and "Gang Colors" styles with an action from a palette purchased (20eb per color/pattern) and installed on an agent. Comes with one color or pattern of choice.

Shock Armor.name: Shock Armor
Shock Armor.description: Kevlar armor that shocks anyone who is grappling you.

Skid Row Trench.name: Skid Row Trench
Skid Row Trench.description: Flak Body Armor that looks like a trench coat in exchange for less protection. -4 to REF, DEX, and MOVE.

Street Viper Riding Suit.name: Street Viper Riding Suit
Street Viper Riding Suit.description:
Kevlar Body Armor that comes with two pre-installed medium melee weapons* always considered drawn as long as the armor is equipped.

*Must be manually added after acquiring the armor.

Tactical Smart Armor.name: Tactical Smart Armor
Tactical Smart Armor.description:
A full set of medium armorjack with integrated smart glasses*. -2 to REF, DEX, and MOVE.

*Smart Glasses must be manually added after acquiring the armor.
